column.name: ENTITY_ID
column.comment: - This column data identifies the ENTITY (INDIVIDUAL or ORGANIZATION) for which the ACCESS INFORMATION is defined.

column.name: NAME
column.comment: !!! PLEASE REPAIR !!! - Here: content of the action

column.name: SALUTATION_DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Salutation form (Herr – Mr., Frau – Mrs.)

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE
column.comment: The name of the entity class for inheritance facilities.

column.name: TERMINATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of the deactivation of the service subscription.

column.name: ORGANIZATION_TYPE_RD
column.comment: The Organization Type defines the kind of Organization in the system.

column.name: DOMESTIC_ORGANIZATION_IND
column.comment: -  Y if the organization is German.

column.name: NLSSORT_NAME_RAW
column.comment: N/A

column.name: NLSSORT_FORENAME_RAW
column.comment: N/A

column.name: CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: Customer number

column.name: INCORPORATION_NUMBER_ID
column.comment: -  This attribute defines the incorporation number for German Business  Customers.

column.name: INDUSTRIAL_SECTOR_RD
column.comment: -  This attribute describes the industrial sector to which the  organization belongs.

column.name: INCORPORATION_TYPE_RD
column.comment: -  This attribute defines the incorporation type for German Business  Customers. It specifies the register which the ORGANIZATION belongs to.

column.name: INCORPORATION_CITY_NAME
column.comment: -  This attribute defines the incorporation city for German Business  Customers. It specifies the city in which the organization is incorporated.

column.name: PRIMARY_ACCESS_INFORMATION_ID
column.comment: Foreign Key to the Access Information Id.

column.name: PRIMARY_ADDRESS_ID
column.comment: Foeign Key to the Address Id.

column.name: ORGANIZATION_SUFFIX_NAME
column.comment: Additional text on the Organization Name which further defines the  Organization.

column.name: ID_CARD_COUNTRY_RD
column.comment: -  This attribute defines the country which issued the INDIVIDUAL s  identification card.

column.name: ID_CARD_EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: -  This attribute represents the expiration date on the INDIVIDUAL s  identification card.

column.name: ID_CARD_TYPE_RD
column.comment: -  This attribute defines the type of identification card. Types of ID  Cards include German ID Card, Foreign ID Card, passport.

column.name: SURNAME_PREFIX_DESCRIPTION
column.comment: -  The surname prefix descriptions are defined in reference data

column.name: FORENAME
column.comment: Legal person’s forename (by entity type: Organization normally remains blank)

column.name: TITLE_DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Legal person’s title.

column.name: NOBILITY_PREFIX_DESCRIPTION
column.comment: -  The nobility prefix descriptions come from reference data and contain  things such as "Sir" and "von".

column.name: MARITAL_STATUS_RD
column.comment: -  This attribute identifies the marital status of the INDIVIDUAL. It  specifies whether the INDIVIDUAL is single, married, divorced, widowed.

column.name: PROFESSION_NAME
column.comment: -  This attribute describes the professional occupation of the  INDIVIDUAL.

column.name: BIRTH_DATE
column.comment: Date of birth

column.name: ID_CARD_NUMBER
column.comment: -  This attribute represents the number that appears on the  identification card of the INDIVIDUAL.

column.name: SPOKEN_LANGUAGE_RD
column.comment: -  The spoken language identifies the language in which the INDIVIDUAL  wants to interact with the telecom company.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update - Audit information capturing user id of last update.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update - Audit information capturing date and time of last update.

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: - Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is incremented on each update. Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: NLSUPPER_NAME
column.comment: - ENTITY.NAME in capital letters for better search performance.

column.name: NLSUPPER_FORENAME
column.comment: - ENTITY.FORENAME in capital letters for better search performance.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: - data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
